'''Coral Crafters Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20200320002953/https://minecraft.net/en-us/article/new-aquatic-skins-out-now|title=New Aquatic Skins Out Today!|author=Tom Stone|date=June 8, 2018|website=[[minecraft.net]]}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that includes 8 ocean-themed skins, celebrating the release of the [[Update Aquatic]]. As part of Mojang's [[Coral Crafters]] campaign to help the oceans,<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.nature.org/en-us/about-us/who-we-are/how-we-work/working-with-companies/cause-marketing/minecraft/|title=TNC and Minecraft Partner for Conservation|website=The Nature Conservancy|section=Past Campaigns}}</ref> net proceeds of the skin pack's sale were contributed to {{Wikipedia|The Nature Conservancy}}, a non-profit environmental organization. At some point, the skin pack was delisted.

== Quotes ==
{{Quote|A selection of sea-worthy skins to celebrate the Update Aquatic! Explore the oceans as a dolphin or turtle, or opt for a statue skin – covered in kelp or coral! Take a deep dive with the Ocean Explorer, Coral Diver and more! Net proceeds will go to support The Nature Conservancy’s efforts to protect and restore coral reefs, learn more at [https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/updates/aquatic#coral-crafters https://aka.ms/coralcrafters].|Minecraft Marketplace description}}
